activities: Excelitas Technologies Corp. collects personal information for, among other things, on-line web access,  human resource and business management such as contact information, payroll administration, maintaining accurate benefits records, managing operating plans, meeting governmental reporting requirements, security, health and safety management, performance management, company network access, and authentication.
contacttitle1: Director of Compliance, North America & Asia Pacific
personaldata: Personnel and medical records, salary, fringe benefits, and terms of employment.  Contact information for persons accessing Excelitas web-site for business or employment.
